鉗.definition: pincers; pliers; tongs; claw (of animal); to grasp with pincers; to pinch; to clamp; to restrain; to restrict; to gag

鉗制.definition: to suppress; to muzzle; to gag

鉗嘴鸛.definition: (bird species of China) Asian openbill (Anastomus oscitans)

鉗子.definition: pliers; pincers; tongs; forceps; vise; clamp; claw (of a crab etc); CL:把[ba3]; (dialect) earring

鉗馬銜枚.definition: with horses and soldiers gagged (idiom); (of a marching army) in utter silence
